caption.center: NANCY PEDEN Employee Below, Appellant, v. DENTSPLY INTERNATIONAL,

opinion.posture: Superior Court of the State of Delaware, in and for Sussex County, No. 03A-11-003.
opinion.panel: Before STEELE, Chief Justice, JACOBS and RIDGELY, Justices.
opinion.opinion_text:
This 14th day of February 2005, the Court, having considered this matter on the briefs of the parties, concludes that the matter should be affirmed on the basis of the Superior Court's opinion dated November 1, 2004.
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the judgments of the Superior Court be AFFIRMED.
